Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Aquarius2010
Reviews.Content: Is a small new hotel, with a beautiful view to Gulhane Park with lightfull room and nice bathroom. Hotel Staff is professional.

Reviews.Title: “hot spot !!”
Reviews.Author: djarum
Reviews.Content: this little hotel is located in the quite side of sultanahmet just a little bit above the basilica cistern..its just a few minutes to hagia sophia and to the blue mosque.. its close to the grand bazaar also - there is a short cut when u walk towards the opposite way of hagia sophia, u will pass from a lovely street full of trees & jewellery stores & cafes - starbucks is on the right side - ... the breakfast was in the middle, u can have ur breakfast in the small area outside the hotel also - not many cars are passing.. close to the hotel there is the house of medusa restaurant - lovely garden w/delicious food... the only negative thing with the hotel was our room was so small and the walls were so thin :S but ok we slept like rocks after tiring busy days :) O.ooo... another advice, book ur shuttle to the airport from the place just on the next door of the hotel, its so cheap... and dont be surprised if u see the person who picked u up from the airport when u were coming, cause the hotel is working with them also ..

Reviews.Title: “awsome place in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: katie_malloni
Reviews.Content: We stayed at old city hostel istanbul and we realy liked it so much..thanks to everybody there...

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Sultanahmet”
Reviews.Author: Wanderlust84
Reviews.Content: This is the place to stay in Sultanahmet. I have traveled to Istanbul several times and stayed in at least three hotels in Sultanahmet. This was, by far, the nicest, friendliest, and best value. Our room was very nice, clean, and comfortable and it is very close to all the sights. The hotel staff is great and breakfast offers a wide variety. You can't go wrong here-- highly recommend! p.s. also note that there is a travel agency nearby that offers cheap (about 6 euros) airport pickup and dropoff.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the OldCity Hotel”
Reviews.Author: fleur_fof
Reviews.Content: Oldcity hotel is a wonderful hotel. We were in Istanbul for our honeymoon and we couldn't have choose a better place to stay. The hotel itself is really beautiful and our room was very large and comfortable. The breakfast was very nice and various and the staff was really helpfull. The position of the hotel is really good, just a few steps from the most important things to see in Sultanahmet. I would surely recommend this hotel and I would come back there in the future.

HotelInfo.Name: Oldcity Hotel Istanbul
HotelInfo.Address: Alaykosku caddesi No 1 | Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34410, Turkey
